info.longBusinessSummary: Seibu Holdings Inc. engages in the urban transportation, hotel and leisure, real estate, construction, and baseball team management businesses in Japan and internationally. It operates through Urban Transportation and Railroad Management Business, Hotel and Leisure Business, Real Estate Business, and Others segments. The company offers railway, bus, and taxi transportation services; and operates hotels, hot springs and spas, golf courses, ski resorts, tennis courts, bowling alleys, skating rinks, fitness clubs, and other leisure facilities. It also develops and sells housing, condominiums, and resort properties; leases office and residential facilities; and develops and operates stores in train stations, shopping malls, and other commercial facilities. In addition, the company maintains a professional baseball team under the Saitama Seibu Lions name; hosts concerts and other non-baseball events through Belluna Dome; and operates and manages amusement parks, aquariums, movie theaters, and pools. Further, it offers fire insurance, automobile insurance, travel insurance, and life insurance products. Additionally, the company provides home and urban development services, pet care products, and builds cemeteries. Seibu Holdings Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
